trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get Subscription</languageKeyword> operation returns account and resource allocation information for the specified subscription.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get Subscription</languageKeyword> operation returns account and resource allocation information for the specified subscription.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get Subscription</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get Subscription</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header must be set to <userInput>2011-10-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header must be set to <userInput>2011-10-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: The format for the response body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format for the response body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the response body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the response body.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the identifier of the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the identifier of the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the status of the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the status of the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the live ID of the account administrator.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the live ID of the account administrator.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the live ID of the subscription administrator.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the live ID of the subscription administrator.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of cores that can be allocated in the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of cores that can be allocated in the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of storage accounts that can be allocated in the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of storage accounts that can be allocated in the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of cloud services that can be allocated in the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of cloud services that can be allocated in the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of currently allocated cores.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of currently allocated cores.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of currently allocated cloud services.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of currently allocated cloud services.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of currently allocated storage accounts.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of currently allocated storage accounts.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of virtual network sites that can be allocated in the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of virtual network sites that can be allocated in the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of currently allocated virtual network sites.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of currently allocated virtual network sites.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of local virtual network sites that can be allocated in the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of local virtual network sites that can be allocated in the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of currently allocated network security groups.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of currently allocated network security groups.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of network security groups.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of network security groups.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of network security rules per group.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of network security rules per group.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of currently allocated local network sites.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of currently allocated local network sites.

trans-unit.source: Specifies he maximum number of DNS servers that can be allocated in the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies he maximum number of DNS servers that can be allocated in the subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Azure Active Directory tenant that is associated with the subscription.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Azure Active Directory tenant that is associated with the subscription.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>What is a Microsoft Azure AD tenant?</linkText><linkUri>http://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj573650.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>What is a Microsoft Azure AD tenant?</linkText><linkUri>http://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj573650.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time that the subscription was created.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time that the subscription was created.
